analysis.description:
TokenSale.finalization (/unique_chucks/12/0x4ac0224821ccc044d358403469c88845dc56f83d.sol#651-654) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/12/0x4ac0224821ccc044d358403469c88845dc56f83d.sol)

TokenSale.withdrawFunds (/unique_chucks/12/0x4ac0224821ccc044d358403469c88845dc56f83d.sol) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(value) (/unique_chucks/12/0x4ac0224821ccc044d358403469c88845dc56f83d.sol)

TokenSale.wallet (/unique_chucks/12/0x4ac0224821ccc044d358403469c88845dc56f83d.sol#582-583) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.wallet (/unique_chucks/12/0x4ac0224821ccc044d358403469c88845dc56f83d.sol#157-159)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0x4ac0224821ccc044d358403469c88845dc56f83d.sol#255-259) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/12/0x4ac0224821ccc044d358403469c88845dc56f83d.sol#257-259)

TokenSale.finalization (/unique_chucks/12/0x4ac0224821ccc044d358403469c88845dc56f83d.sol#651-654) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(reserveWallet,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/12/0x4ac0224821ccc044d358403469c88845dc56f83d.sol)

TokenSale._getTokenAmount.rate (local variable @ /unique_chucks/12/0x4ac0224821ccc044d358403469c88845dc56f83d.sol#635-636) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.rate (state variable @ /unique_chucks/12/0x4ac0224821ccc044d358403469c88845dc56f83d.sol#160-161)

TimedCrowdsale.TimedCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/12/0x4ac0224821ccc044d358403469c88845dc56f83d.sol#369-378) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/12/0x4ac0224821ccc044d358403469c88845dc56f83d.sol#373)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/12/0x4ac0224821ccc044d358403469c88845dc56f83d.sol#382-396) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/12/0x4ac0224821ccc044d358403469c88845dc56f83d.sol#383-396)
